dmca.title: [ABUSE] FA Premier League: A/V infringements - FAPL_NRID11409
dmca.body:
-----Original Message-----
From: The Planet Policy Enforcement [mailto:abuse@theplanet.com] 
Sent: Thursday, February 24, 2005 9:53 AM
Cc: copyright@theplanet.com
Subject: Fwd: [ABUSE] FA Premier League: A/V infringements - FAPL_NRID11409

-----BEGIN PGP SIGNED MESSAGE-----
Hash: SHA1




Your email is being sent to our copyright-related legal counsel at the
address copyright@theplanet.com for consideration.

- --
Thanks,

Policy Enforcement
The Planet Internet Services, Inc.
http://www.theplanet.com/aup/


This is a forwarded message
From: Phil Stubbs <phils@nr-online.com>
To: <abuse@theplanet.com>
Date: Thursday, February 24, 2005, 9:18:44 AM
Subject: [ABUSE] FA Premier League: A/V infringements - FAPL_NRID11409

===8<==============Original message text===============
Hello Abuse Team,

I am contacting you about a site you are currently hosting
http://www.sportingstreams.com/. This site is offering live streams for our
client, The FA Premier Leagues copyrighted clips.

The FA Premier League is the worlds most watched soccer league and SKY
television in the UK have a
